rows.title: Welcome to @global.app_name
rows.message_text:
You deserve to feel good, and have happier family relationships.

@global.app_name is here to support you.

Here is how to use the app:
This big button takes you to the session we encourage you to explore.
Here you can select any of the other sessions in @global.app_name by swiping to the next sessions.
You can explore any session whenever you want. To build your knowledge and skills in Parenting, access all of the content in one session before moving to the next one.
